member.name: O:Page::System#Email#SMTP Account
member.summary: Displays an account that was registered via the SMTP connector.

member.name: O:Table::System#Email#SMTP Account
member.summary: Holds the information for all e-mail accounts that are registered via the SMTP connector

member.name: O:Page::System#Email#SMTP Account Wizard
member.summary: Displays an account that is being registered via the SMTP connector.

member.summary: Enum extension to register the SMTP connector.

member.summary: The SMTP connector.

member.name: M:Codeunit::System#Email#SMTP Connector Impl#.GetAccounts(Email Account@)
member.summary: Gets the registered accounts for the SMTP connector.
member.param: Out parameter holding all the registered accounts for the SMTP connector.

member.name: M:Codeunit::System#Email#SMTP Connector Impl#.ShowAccountInformation(Guid)
member.summary: Shows accounts information.
member.param: The ID of the account to show.

member.name: M:Codeunit::System#Email#SMTP Connector Impl#.RegisterAccount(Email Account@):Boolean
member.summary: Register an e-mail account for the SMTP connector.
member.param: Out parameter holding details of the registered account.
member.returns: True if the registration was successful; false - otherwise.

member.name: M:Codeunit::System#Email#SMTP Connector Impl#.DeleteAccount(Guid):Boolean
member.summary: Deletes an e-mail account for the SMTP connector.
member.param: The ID of the e-mail account
member.returns: True if an account was deleted.

member.name: M:Codeunit::System#Email#SMTP Connector Impl#.Send(Codeunit::System#Email#Email Message,Guid)
member.summary: Sends an e-mail via the SMTP connector.
member.param: The ID of the account to be used for sending.
member.error: SMTP connector failed to connect to server.
SMTP connector failed to authenticate against server.
SMTP connector failed to send the email.

member.summary: Gets a description of the SMTP connector.
member.returns: A short description of the SMTP connector.

member.summary: Gets the SMTP connector logo.
member.returns: A base64-formatted image to be used as logo.

member.summary: Provide the credentials to authenticate using OAuth 2.0 for Exchange Online mailboxes.
member.param: Authentication user name for SMTP client. Email address of the user who is attempting to authenticate.
Acquired access token for SMTP client.

member.name: M:Codeunit::System#Email#OAuth2 SMTP Authentication.AuthenticateWithOAuth2
member.summary: Authenticate the current user. Disregard the token cache and show the authentication dialog.

member.name: M:Codeunit::System#Email#OAuth2 SMTP Authentication.CheckOAuth2Authentication
member.summary: Verify if the current user is successfully authenticated. If there is token cache, it will be used. Otherwise, the authentication dialog will be shown.

member.summary: Get user's email address by the access token.
